snippet: Two Iranian film groups issued an apologetic statement saying their intended ceremony for Asghar Farhadi had been denied government permission
abstract: Two Iranian film groups issued an apologetic statement saying their intended ceremony for Asghar Farhadi had been denied government permission

headline.main: Iranian Ceremony to Honor 'Separation' Director Is Canceled
headline.print_headline: Ceremony in Iran for ‘Separation’ Director Is Canceled
